title: Publisher Rocket - How to Research HOT and Trending Niches

tactics.name: Niche Down with BSR Filters
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to drill into specific categories and filter by BSR rankings and competitive scores.
steps: Launch Publisher Rocket and input niche keywords
Cross-reference with Amazon bestsellers in incognito mode
caveats: Avoid categories with irrelevant listings (e.g. Minecraft zombie books in 'buses' category)
source_quotes: we're probably looking for something under a 100 so maybe buses is not what we want

tactics.name: Competitor Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate niche viability by analyzing competitor books' rankings, sales, and reviews
steps: Use Publisher Rocket's competitor analyzer to check book details
Analyze BSR, price, and monthly sales data
Verify product details like age appropriateness and format
Cross-reference with KD Spy for deeper insights
caveats: Inconsistent data may require manual verification
source_quotes: we can see the paperback is actually priced at $14

tactics.name: category_inspection
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to analyze niche categories for growth rates and competition
caveats: When niche saturation exceeds keyword availability
source_quotes: low competition uh only three sales to number 10

tactics.name: keyword_analysis
tactics.description: Leverage keyword insights to refine niche targeting
steps: Input niche keywords into Publisher Rocket
Adjust book formatting for target age groups
source_quotes: estimated number of searches here that's a big number

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Filter
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is below 100, prioritize the niche
source_quotes: lower to one the better up to 100 that's very very competitive

heuristics.name: Ranking Threshold
heuristics.condition: If BSR exceeds 50,000, consider niche viability
source_quotes: current ranking is 26,000 which is very very good

heuristics.name: low_competition_boost
heuristics.condition: If niche has low competition and high growth potential
source_quotes: low competition uh only three sales to number 10

claims.statement: KDP niches with BSR rankings under 50000 indicate higher visibility potential
source_quotes: we're probably looking for something under a 100 so maybe buses is not what we want

claims.statement: Amazon allows direct category placement for niche targeting
source_quotes: Amazon allows you to place the book into directly into this category

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket provides category-specific sales data and keyword insights
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket has provided us with that insight

niche_patterns.description: Target specific age groups with educational themes that have minimal market saturation
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines clear identity (toddlers), specific problem (transportation learning), and low competition signals
source_quotes: we want to find books that we can create that aren't these kinds of books

niche_patterns.description: Combine broad categories with specific sub-niches and preferred formats
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets underserved sub-segments with format flexibility
source_quotes: you might get some good keywords just by going through and writing down the names of these books
